short_description: east atlantic network is a cable & internet provider based in lagos, nigeria.
long_description: east atlantic network ltd is a private limited liability company registered in nigeria in november 2003. it started business as a multichoice nigeria ltd. franchisee (owners of dstv & gotv brands) in 2009. its scope of business includes; subscriber management for dstv & gotv subscription collection as a super dealer to multichoice. sales of ikeja electric vtu powered by fcmb. east atlantic network ltd. proudly presents our free delivery service. whether it's cutting-edge gadgets or advanced systems, enjoy seamless shopping with hassle-free delivery, exclusively from east atlantic network ltd. secure payment east atlantic network ltd is your trusted online platform for seamless and secure financial transactions. east atlantic network ltd offers round-the-clock 24/7 support, ensuring uninterrupted assistance for all your electronic needs. east atlantic network ltd is being led by its founder mr john ezenagu ogbata who oversees the company's day-to-day activities. he has over 20 years of business experience which covers marketing, advertising, franchise dealership, and mentoring.

generated_description: east atlantic network, legally known as east atlantic network ltd., is a private limited liability company registered in nigeria in november 2003. it began as a franchisee of multichoice nigeria ltd. in 2009, specializing in the sales and installations of dstv and gotv brands. the company expanded its services to include the sale and installation of ikeja electric recharge cards, vtu powered by fcmb, solar energy systems, cctv cameras, and airtel recharge cards and smart boxes. also provides subscriber management for dstv and gotv subscriptions as a super dealer to multichoice. the company offers 24/7 customer support and aims to deliver quick, qualitative, and reliable customer service.
